column2: The  2nd  Party  Respondent-Petitioner  Appellant  (hereinafter  referred  to
as the Appellant) has made this appeal against the Order made by the
Learned  High  Court  Judge  of  Kandy  on  31st  January  2020  dismissing
the revision application made against the Magistrate’s Order dated 15th
The  dispute  had  arisen  in  the  instant  action  under  Section  66  of  the
Primary Court’s Procedure Act No. 44 of 1979.
In  the  instant  appeal  the  Appellant  had  sought  the  following  reliefs  in
the prayer of the petition dated 17th February 2020;
